title: feat: upgrade TTS from eleven_multilingual_v2 to eleven_v3
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: The hive speaks with feeling
gist.blurb: Our text-to-speech engine just got an emotional upgrade with ElevenLabs v3. You can now direct the tone with tags like [laughing] or [whispering] across 70+ languages.
gist.summary: Upgraded the default text-to-speech provider to ElevenLabs v3, unlocking emotion tags and multi-speaker capabilities.
gist.impact: Developers can generate highly expressive speech with emotional context, though single-request character limits are now streamlined to 5,000.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee in a recording booth, showcasing the new range of vocal emotions. Visual symbols: microphone, speech bubbles with emotion icons.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute 8-bit bee mascot singing into a vintage microphone in a warm recording studio. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Speech bubbles with pixelated emotion icons (laughing face, crying face) floating around. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
